org.apache.flink.core.fs

接口 FileSystemFactory

  • 所有已知实现类:
    ConnectionLimitingFactory, HadoopFsFactory, LocalFileSystemFactory, MapRFsFactory, S3FileSystemFactory, S3FileSystemFactory, UnsupportedSchemeFactory

    @PublicEvolving
public interface FileSystemFactory
    A factory to create file systems.

    The factory is typically configured via configure(Configuration) before creating file systems via create(URI).

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void configure(Configuration config)
      Applies the given configuration to this factory.
      FileSystem create(java.net.URI fsUri)
      Creates a new file system for the given file system URI.
      java.lang.String getScheme()
      Gets the scheme of the file system created by this factory.

    • 方法详细资料

      • getScheme

        java.lang.String getScheme()
        Gets the scheme of the file system created by this factory.

      • configure

        void configure(Configuration config)
        Applies the given configuration to this factory. All future file system instantiations via create(URI) should take the configuration into account.
        参数:
        config - The configuration to apply.

      • create

        FileSystem create(java.net.URI fsUri)
           throws java.io.IOException
        Creates a new file system for the given file system URI. The URI describes the type of file system (via its scheme) and optionally the authority (for example the host) of the file system.
        参数:
        fsUri - The URI that describes the file system.
        返回:
        A new instance of the specified file system.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown if the file system could not be instantiated.
